name: Nearsighted Ghost
description:
Scare away the strangers that wander around your haunted house, eager to discover the secrets of the ghost that haunts there. If they discover your secrets, will they still be scared of you?

  • Haunt in your maze but you are a nearsighted ghost.
  • Top-down game.
  • Simple controls.
  • Minimalistic design.

Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys: Movement
Space: Scare
